ygData.subject: Re: Mermaids and other water mysteries
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if its the same or not, but in the Ocean of tears there is an island chain that is populated by aqua gobs and two sirens which are similar looking
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if its the same or not, but in the Ocean of tears there is an
island chain that is populated by aqua gobs and two sirens which are similar
looking to mermaids. Maybe these are the same that people see in Eurdin
xing?

-----Original Message-----
>I too swear I saw a mermaid while swimming in South Qeynos waiting for the
>boat. It was certainly not a shark. Yet when I swam to where it was, there
>was nothing there (I was to dumb or dumbfounded to /con it). I have asked
>many if they had seen one, but people kept saying that there are none in
the
>game. While I have yet to go all "Ahab" and devote my life to hunting one
>down, it is nice to hear I am not alone in this rare sighting.
